subSections.title: Etymology 1
Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|しかばね}}

Compound of {{compound|ja|sort=しかばね|死|tr1=shi|t1=death; dead|屍|tr2=kabane|t2=corpse}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref><ref name="DJS">{{R:Daijisen}}</ref>  Not used in the ''{{w|Man'yōshū}}''; appears to be a later development.

subSections.title: Alternative forms
subSections.text: * {{ja-l|尸}} {{qualifier|mainly used for compounds, like {{m|ja|尸冠|tr=shikabane kanmuri}}}}

subSections.title: Noun
